places_with_reviews.name: haritha hotel Bhadrachalam
address: Temple Rd, opp. Sub Collector Office, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: Good rooms n nice ventilation with hot water in the attached bathroom. Both potty and wash rooms are separate and the washbasin is in the middle of both rooms. Which saves time to get ready. A good balcony gives a good outer scenic view. Beds and blankets are also neat and clean. The price of the rooms are a high compared to outside hotels and private rooms. Also need to increase the non a/c rooms(11 count) instead a/c rooms(37) i think. Overall good hospitality for families.

Govt dept run  hotel. Spacious, good location. But in not very good conditions. Bathrooms bad. No facilities at all. Beddings are not maintained.  Reception had huge lizards running. No restaurant. Good place but no maintenance. 😞

A good place to stay while considering the room charges.  This being a govt institution, one should not expect much more.  You might encounter cockroaches.  Food is not up to the mark.  Services are as if they are doing a favour.

Location is the only best part of this hotel and it is 700m distant from the temple. Parking space is nice when compared to other hotels. But you have to be cautious when parking ur vehicle. Rooms are ok. U r lucky if the ac is working in your room. So don't expect more by looking at the gmaps pics. Overall, it's a decent spot to spend one night with family and friends.

Nothing very special except the location which is adjacent to the Bhadrachalam temple. Service is very poor actually there is no room Service at all. Such a huge hotel with all amenities but lacks proper care. Having a huge restaurant and dining area but not functional.

places_with_reviews.name: SRI BHAVYA RESIDENCY
address: Ramalayam Kalyanamandapam road, MV8M+XM5, 4-1-64, opp. SBI&HDFC ATM, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: Very convenient and walkable distance to temple. Rooms are spacious. Cleanliness can be improved. Hot water is available from solar heaters. When there is not enough sun, you don’t get hot water. Our room had a great view of temple.

The hotel was located very near to the temple. Hotel rooms are maintained in a good condition.
We cannot expect any services like metropolitan hotels in this city
Services are meeting the city level expectations

Decent rooms, neat and very near to the temple. Rooms are a little small with basic things. As it's residency, there's no restaurant and also no parking facility, but they will help you to park before the residency itself. You can find many eatable places nearby
Everything is perfect. Their hospitality is so good! They gave us a room even after we checked out. Temple view from windows is best thing about this residency!

Centrally located hotel and very close to temple. Rooms were good and neat, but no maintenance at all. Rooms were not cleaned, and bedsheets were not changed every day. Moreover, lizards and cockroaches were having gala time in the room. Miscommunication between night staff and  management is very large and always affects the end consumer. We had a very bad experience due to this miscommunication, and management was too blunt to sort out the issue smoothly.  NOT RECOMMENDED

places_with_reviews.name: Srinidhi Residency
address: MV8M+JHX, Temple Rd, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: Location of the room is very good, just a 2 minute walk from the main temple. The room is good, but there were more than 20 mosquitoes in our room. That was very irritating. Maintenence should be improved. Car parking is available, which is very nice.

It's good and family friendly. The biggest plus point is that it's right next to the main temple. But sleep may be disturbed due to noise from adjacent temple. Otherwise, clean and functional. No food and beverages. But a two minute walk will lead to tea and food stalls.

Go for it 👍
Rooms are okay given that it's a piligrim area. Location is amazing, just a minute walk to main temple and very close by to many other shops too. Overall Excellent 👍
Good hotel.very neat and clean rooms . Location is very near to west entrance of temple.

The rooms are neat and clean. The staff takes really good care in making sure your linens are tidy and your washroom is clean.
There's not a lot to offer for service though, no restaurant, no room service etc. One can however just take a quick walk to go to a nearby eatery.
There's parking in the basement, it's better to intimate the hotel prior to your arrival as the parking space is a little tight in my opinion (parks 4-5 cars).
The location is superb, temple is at a walkable distance.

Overall, very good value for your back for a nights stay or two.

places_with_reviews.name: Varun Residency
address: Ramalayam center, 1-1-38, near Godavari river Venkateshwara Colony, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text:
Very nice place, great staff. The hotel is very conveniently located, a mere 2 minutes from the temple and another 2 minutes from the river, if one wishes to take a dip in the waters before visiting the temple.

Highly recommended, especially for the hospitality shown by the staff.

This property in Badrachalam offers excellent value for money. It is situated within easy walking distance of the temple and Godavari ghat. The rooms are very clean and the service is outstanding. I would definitely recommend this place for a stay.

Excellent hotel nearer to Temple,Godavari river ghat,food courts & excellent service by Shri Srinivasarao garu & team ,Sri sitaramachadra Murthy will bless them & families since all of them are taking care of pilgrims needs ,hotel maintenance is good & suitably designed for pilgrims
Nice and clean rooms. Worth the money for the price. Extremely helpful staff and very close proximity to the temple. There are many stalls selling homemade and very delicious food near the hotel.

Nice hotel.We stayed in pent house room as we were 5 members.Room was neat and clean.we had view of temple from one side and godavari on other side.Very near to both river and temple.They arranged  nice sitting area with shade.They have their own good parking area .Had a great stay.

Non AC room - 1000/-
AC room - 1500/-
Name itself AC room but AC won't work.
TV is there but NO cable connection.
Geyser is there but NO water since there is NO power connection for that.
NO wifi at least. NO single for mobile network.
NO generator during powercuts, suffered a lot (around 6hrs) in hot summer.

Better to choose a Non AC room instead.

Special note: whatever we asked management, they will respond 'NO' only.

I stayed in an AC room. The room n bathroom are pretty clean. The food they served for dinner in the Satram is delicious. The reception is warm and welcoming. This is pretty close to the temple. I would highy recommend this place.
Good ambience and good food, friendly staff

Nice place
Just 300 Meters from temple
Non AC rooms charge 700
&
AC rooms charge 1200
Free meals in it's price
Worth stay
It was nice experience to stay there and was near to temple...

places_with_reviews.name: Nandini Residency
address: MV9M+5VV, Old Market Road, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text:
Good hotel in bhadrachalam.
New property which has opened up recently.
Located around 200 meters from the temple.
Rooms are spacious and clean. Toilets are clean and running hot water is available.
Ample parking available.
Family Rooms are more compared to single and double bed rooms.
There is no restaurant in the hotel.
We need to walk around 200 meters to find a restaurant.
Overall, there are only small restaurants in the town.
Not satisfied. No hot water in our room. They provided heater which takes lot of time to heat. Double check if taps are working fine before checking in.

Every thing was good except room service....they charged 3500 for a suit room for 4 members but they didn't provided drinking water....I asked the I got 1 lt water bottle.....they are selling 1ltr water bottle @25rs
Just walkble distance for temple and car parking very classy and hi-fi rooms are available. quick service available for room cleaning.very reasonable  prices .
Very clean and new Residency to stay nearby Badhrachalam temple. I liked it, but the room cost is a bit high in my view..

places_with_reviews.name: RAGHAVANILAYAM REDDY BHAVAN
address: MVGR+P58, Ashok Nagar Colony, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: Neat and spacious with many rooms. Approach from the town is a bit tough though due to a narrow road with a sharp turn.
Good To stay, Ambience is good. The only concern is a little far from the city, you need to have a vehicle.
Rooms were neat, clean and spacious.
We have arranged a training/ workshop, place is out of the City and calm area. But we can't expect tea, snacks here. Lunch will be arranged based on order, tasty and good.

I got married here. the location is not good and there is no enough parking. AC are not working we have to bring our own technicians to repair them. Atlast as it was my marriage I am happy that's why 4 rating or else it would be 2

places_with_reviews.name: Sri Sudharsana Residency
address: 1-1-61, Temple Main Road Opp: Ramalayam Temple, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: Located close to the temple. Rooms are just average. Very small. Tv doesn't work in the room. From the balcony you can see the temple. Car parking is not there. You have to park near the temple. No restaurant in the hotel. Opposite restaurants are there. The staff are ok. Price is higher for  the room

A very nice place to stay.
Clean rooms, very near to the temple, polite staff
Very bad .don't book room in this hotel ..normal days 1500 weakends...2000 no tv ..no wifi
Room was clean and neat but bathroom sanitary ware is not at all in good condition.

Residency very west maintenance and
Bad service and not maintenance don't prer tha residency
Nice accommodation and friendly service. Annadhanam is also available
Near to bhadrachalam temple, has parking 10 cars, Rooms ok for one day stay.

Worst wedding/family event venue of all time.
Greedy management and low grade service.
They charge over agreement fee middle of the event and threaten to cancel the event.
1 star rating is waste too.
Be cautious booking this venue.
There are better wedding functional hall in the town.

A nice venue for stay. Very welcoming staff.
Great rooms, neatly maintained.
Near to main temple. Food is also served on prior intimation. AC and hot geysers available.
Rooms will be allocated on their availability.
A small temple present in premises. Ample parking space.
A function hall as well available in the venue.
Overall a great place.

I am going yesterday my frnd marriage he alotment room here rooms are very clean nice bed ac fully working condition and banquet hall was very good my frnds fully enjoy in sangeet hall dinning hall also good fully air conditioner all good please visit with family..

places_with_reviews.name: Sitaram Inn - Bhadrachalam
address: 13-2-199, OPP RTC, Bus Stand Rd, Ashok Nagar Colony, Bhadrachalam, Andhra Pradesh 507111, India

reviews.text: We had phoned to book the room since we would reach late in the night. Once we reached, the night receptionist was busy with his personal phone call, he didn't disconnect! Room didn't have towels or toiletries, there was a hot water kettle, but no water, cups or glasses. It didn't even have a power socket except next to the bedside table. Quite a pricey hotel for no service at all. Bad experience.

Earlier good this hotel .now wonder no service ,only need improve service and increase man power ..now very wonder occupancy is very low ...if service and renovate the rooms customer will comes more ..

I booked the room for a night, it was quite comfortable, it’s new with good and new design, bathrooms were very clean. 4 star as the hot water was not coming in tap and this is winter. They don’t have restaurant in hotel. Parking was available. bedsheets were not ironed. It’s on the main road very convenient. This one is best in terms of new trends of hotel room in badrachalam i didn’t find better then this hotel. Nearby many hotels tiffin centre’s are available.

Good and affordable rooms.
You will get auto to temple by paying Rs.20/person.
I paid 1600 for one night.

Hi all, we stayed at this hotel for a day and our experience was really bad. The room key they give you doesn't work and every time you have to wait for the receptionist to open the door for you. Bedsheets were not neat and service. Very poor
Think twice before opting.
Very limited car parking that too open area.
No hot water.
